title: Opioid Maker Mallinckrodt Changes Management Severance to Lump-Sum Payments
text:
Mallinckrodt PLC recently changed its severance-package policy to allow for departing executives of the drug company to receive lump-sum payouts instead of installment payments, and ensuring the policy endures should it change ownership structure, such as liquidating or reorganizing, filings show.
